Title: French Connection II
Writer: Alexander Jacobs (screenplay), Robert Dillon (screenplay), Laurie Dillon (screenplay), Robert Dillon (story), Laurie Dillon (story)
Actors: Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Philippe Léotard
Plot: New York narcotics detective Popeye Doyle follows the trail of the French connection smuggling ring to France where he teams up with the gendarmes to hunt down the ringleader.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 2 nominations.
